description.plain: 911 represents complete anarchy, total disregard for authority, and winning by any means. It’s a song about, once you finally make it happen, stunting on everybody who doubted.

songs.embed_content: Read “911” by GRAVEHEART on Genius

album.full_title: MARIPOSA DE LA MUERTE by GRAVEHEART
album.name: MARIPOSA DE LA MUERTE

body.plain: 911 represents complete anarchy, total disregard for authority, and winning by any means. It’s a song about, once you finally make it happen, stunting on everybody who doubted.

songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]

911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit
911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit

[Verse 1]

Adventuring, Aventador-in'
Imagine pullin' up in a foreign
Through the drive-thru
Everybody keep staring
We don't do McDonald's, man, we only do McLarens
Bop in the middle of my beat
Reclining my seat
Talking all that shit, I see you declining to meet
Changing up the climate, what I'm stepping in is heat
And it's definite I'm dripping, got that ice up on the skis
Only breaking bread with the ones who broke it with me
Lock, barrel, and stock, and you ain't a broker to me
Not taking advice from anyone broker than me
I maneuver through the white like I hit the coca, the leaf
(Hit the slopes)
I need diamonds 'round my neck that make me choke
(Get the boats)
It's surprising, all this weight and we still float
(Let 'em know)
That we winning and I'm coming for they throats
And my doors are suicidal like they hangin' from the ropes

[Chorus]

911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit
911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit

[Verse 2]

Yeah
They movin' weight, movin' bales
Christian Louboutins in the Batmobile, I feel like Christian Bale
It's a different fucking calibre, so I won't ever fail
Got em hangin' off the banister when I go off the rails
Differ cause I'm icy
Y'all be looking mice-y
Faded off Hey Y'alls, I got that sugar honey iced tea
Shit, plug break down a brick
Pass it off to me
It's a party with your bitch (With your bitch)
Young, misunderstood, with misappropriated funds
Dots all on your face, you ain't exfoliated once
Bones all on my flag so you know my team lurkin'
You might think you safe but a star gon' burst in

[Chorus]

911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit
911 like it's tragic
90210, I got that California magic
Whip a 911 through the traffic
I just gotta stunt for all the times I never had shit

songs.embed_content: Read “BLING” by GRAVEHEART on Genius
songs.title: BLING
songs.lyrics:
(Chorus)

I want my money
I want my cars
I want my things
I want my cash
I want my racks
I want some tings
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling

(Verse 1)

Pay me reparations, I'mma smoke
Hood'll never hide you, I'mma smoke you out
How I'm separated from all of the broke
Know a lot of people wanna know me now
Only want it if you fuck with me 'fore they all fuck with me
I want good marijuana, good company
Don't switch up on me suddenly, don't deserve that
Float, on the keys, like my brodie brought a bird back
Ponder on my life, I want my blessings in possessions
I'mma get it right, for the money, man I'm destined
Wonder why they hate, stay out of my accounts
And we just did a show, couple grand for the count
Burning sandalwood if you wondering 'bout the smell
Television flickering, playing Ghost in the Shell
Ain't it funny, rolling deep like Adele?
And what we smoking so damn loud, you could listen to the smell

(Chorus)

I want my money
I want my cars
I want my things
I want my cash
I want my racks
I want some tings
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling

(Verse 2)

I can feel my power surging like Ibaka
Politickin', how we came up off the block, huh?
New girl, outspoken like a protest
Gettin' Nikes when I wasn't getting no checks
We gotta reiterate, my gang proliferate, grow larger
Dom Perignon, no Honey Brown Lager
How we doing business, you would think I went to Sauder
Leave me with your daughter, I might have her join the roster
Yeah, I'm with Fleet, yeah, smoking like a Rasta
Yeah, I'm with Chi, yeah, we don't do imposter
We gon' need a bigger boat just like I met Jaws, huh?
All your friends imaginary like you went to Foster
OG shout, taught me how to reroute
Too gone off the white, I'm looking Santorini, Greece now
Hot like Charmander but I'm cuttin' like a Scyther
East Van Shawty but just know I'll never wife her

(Chorus)

I want my money
I want my cars
I want my things
I want my cash
I want my racks
I want some tings
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling
When I come through, I don't mean to be rude
I want my bling

(Outro)

Yeah, yeah
Let it sing bitch
I want the bling bitch
I won't ever give a bitch a ring
I won't ever give a bitch a ring
I just- I want that bling
I want that bling
That bling

description.plain: CABBAGE PATCH KIDS is, obviously, about smoking weed. I don’t think anyone else has compared weed to smoking lettuce wraps so I just thought it was a funny way of putting it together. Who would’ve known it would make for one of the hardest songs on the album?

songs.embed_content: Read “CABBAGE PATCH KIDS” by GRAVEHEART on Genius
songs.title: CABBAGE PATCH KIDS

album.full_title: MARIPOSA DE LA MUERTE by GRAVEHEART
album.name: MARIPOSA DE LA MUERTE

body.plain: CABBAGE PATCH KIDS is, obviously, about smoking weed. I don’t think anyone else has compared weed to smoking lettuce wraps so I just thought it was a funny way of putting it together. Who would’ve known it would make for one of the hardest songs on the album?

songs.lyrics:
(Chorus)

Smoke a lettuce wrap, out the cabbage patch
Kids outfitted in black, murdered out whip, no cap
Split a woody out the pack, out the woods and I'm back
Got your bitch in my lap, and we never giving dap

(Verse 1)

I made it through the extremities
All of my dawgs gon' make it out the cold
I thought I gave you the remedy
Still I got people that wanna do road, yeah
Dripping water like it's 'Fina, pour up a drink, only sip on Dasani
Ironic that we out in Fiji, been hallucinating like Salvador Dali
I might just go off
Got 'em pissed off
Got a pistola, let it go off
Raiding 'em tombs, like I was Croft
Thought I was soft
Fuck with a boss, ay
Golly gee wilikers Batman, they coming with jokes
They wanna kick it like Van Damme, must want all of the smoke
Man, I'm choked (Man I'm choked)
End of my rope (End of my rope)
I gotta blow, this I know
Fuck an opp, and the po
I got rocks, and they pop for the low
And my block never stop smoking dro
We just

(Chorus)

Smoke a lettuce wrap, out the cabbage patch
Kids outfitted in black, murdered out whip, no cap
Split a woody out the pack, out the woods and I'm back
Got your bitch in my lap, and we never giving dap

(Verse 2)

Don't wanna murder my enemies
Catch a body incidentally, though
My boys available readily
But we got 'em holding steadily though
Will my confederate better me?
I hit up Genevieve, she got the blow
I been so gone off the ketamine
You could meet me at the top of the slope
Bag secured, we in Iceland
Still ain't never left my city
It's a hundred people with me
Only twenty people with me
Who be with me on the really?
Who just really wanna kill me?
And who be tryna make amends?
Cause I don't forget or forgive, and I thought I told muhfuckas that we can't ever be friends
I'm popping off
Y'all kinda soft
I want the dough
Like Papa John's
I'm really 'bout it
Y'all gotta know
But when I show, y'all vámanos
I been really with the team, flags up, and we running bags up, God damn, can you imagine that?
We not smoking what you smoking though, I might just overdose off of the cabbage patch

(Chorus)

Smoke a lettuce wrap, out the cabbage patch
Kids outfitted in black, murdered out whip, no cap
Split a woody out the pack, out the woods and I'm back
Got your bitch in my lap, and we never giving dap

(Outro)

And we never giving dap, yeah
And we not giving dap
And we not giving dap, yeah
